event.description: Thomas Bourdon singles on a soft line drive to shortstop Mike Aviles. Thomas Bourdon out at 2nd, shortstop Mike Aviles to second baseman Nick Punto.
Andrew Lawrence grounds out to first baseman David Ortiz.
Anthony Melchionda strikes out swinging, catcher Ryan Lavarnway to first baseman David Ortiz.
Defensive Substitution: Juan Carlos Linares replaces center fielder Che-Hsuan Lin, batting 2nd, playing center field.
Matt Pare grounds out, third baseman Kevin Youkilis to first baseman David Ortiz.
Spenser Payne flies out to center fielder Juan Carlos Linares.
Marc Perdios grounds out, shortstop Mike Aviles to first baseman David Ortiz.
Pitcher Change: Junichi Tazawa replaces Felix Doubront.
Rob Moir singles on a line drive to left fielder Jason Repko.
With John Hennessy batting, Rob Moir steals (1) 2nd base.
John Hennessy singles on a fly ball to left fielder Jason Repko. Rob Moir scores.
Blake Butera strikes out swinging.
Thomas Bourdon doubles (1) on a fly ball to left fielder Jason Repko. John Hennessy to 3rd.
Andrew Lawrence grounds out, first baseman David Ortiz to pitcher Junichi Tazawa. John Hennessy scores. Thomas Bourdon to 3rd.
Anthony Melchionda grounds out, third baseman Kevin Youkilis to first baseman David Ortiz.
Geoffrey Murphy grounds out, second baseman Nick Punto to first baseman David Ortiz.
Spenser Payne walks.

Rob Moir singles on a line drive to center fielder Juan Carlos Linares. Spenser Payne to 3rd.
John Hennessy flies out to left fielder Jason Repko.
Pedro Ciriaco remains in the game as the shortstop.
Nate Spears remains in the game as the third baseman.
Defensive Substitution: Lars Anderson replaces first baseman David Ortiz, batting 4th, playing first base.
Defensive Substitution: Luis Exposito replaces catcher Ryan Lavarnway, batting 6th, playing catcher.

Offensive Substitution: Pinch hitter Travis Ferrick replaces Blake Butera.
Travis Ferrick hit by pitch.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch hitter Matt McGovern replaces Thomas Bourdon.
Matt McGovern reaches on fielding error by shortstop Pedro Ciriaco. Travis Ferrick to 3rd. Matt McGovern to 2nd.
Andrew Lawrence grounds out, second baseman Nick Punto to first baseman Lars Anderson. Travis Ferrick scores. Matt McGovern to 3rd.
Anthony Melchionda grounds out, shortstop Pedro Ciriaco to first baseman Lars Anderson.
Nate LaPointe singles on a ground ball to third baseman Nate Spears.
Spenser Payne strikes out swinging.
Defensive Substitution: Oscar Tejeda replaces second baseman Nick Punto, batting 5th, playing second base.
Marc Perdios grounds out, shortstop Pedro Ciriaco to first baseman Lars Anderson.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch hitter Kyle Prohovich replaces Rob Moir.
Kyle Prohovich strikes out swinging.
Tyler Hinchliffe lines out to left fielder Jason Repko.
Pitcher Change: Chorye Spoone replaces Doug Mathis, batting 6th.
Defensive Substitution: Dan Butler remains in the game as the catcher, batting 8th.
Travis Ferrick strikes out swinging.
Matt McGovern grounds out, shortstop Pedro Ciriaco to first baseman Lars Anderson.
Andrew Lawrence grounds out to first baseman Lars Anderson.
Mike Aviles grounds out, second baseman Blake Butera to first baseman Spenser Payne.

David Ortiz walks. Kevin Youkilis to 2nd.

Josh Kroeger walks. Ryan Lavarnway to 2nd.
Alex Hassan walks. Ryan Lavarnway to 3rd. Josh Kroeger to 2nd.

Kevin Youkilis walks.
David Ortiz flies out to right fielder Marc Perdios.
Pitcher Change: John Gorman replaces Steve Green.
Defensive Substitution: Geoffrey Murphy replaces catcher Matt Pare, batting 4th, playing catcher.
Nick Punto flies out to left fielder Andrew Lawrence.
Ryan Lavarnway doubles (1) on a line drive to left fielder Andrew Lawrence.
Josh Kroeger flies out to center fielder Thomas Bourdon.

With Juan Carlos Linares batting, Pedro Ciriaco steals (1) 3rd base.
Juan Carlos Linares singles on a ground ball to left fielder Andrew Lawrence. Pedro Ciriaco scores.
Kevin Youkilis grounds into a force out, shortstop Anthony Melchionda to second baseman Blake Butera. Juan Carlos Linares out at 2nd. Kevin Youkilis to 1st.

With David Ortiz batting, Nate Spears caught stealing 2nd base, catcher Nate LaPointe to shortstop Anthony Melchionda.
